upcomingMaintenanceWindows.title: Demo Day!
message: Here is to a successful KBase Demo Day üôè
BTW this is a demo of the system status and alert widget üòÇ
Feel free to close an alert. It will not reappear (unless modified) during this ui session.
It gets a little ridiculous when the message is long.
We will be performing system maintenance on Thursday, May 10, 2018, from approximately 8pm to 9pm Pacific time (10pm-11pm CDT).
All production services will be unavailable for portions of this window.
